;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** ;* ;* NAME: ;* GET_MODISA_L1B_REFLECTANCE_LINUX ;* ;* PURPOSE: ;* RETURNS THE L1B REFLECTANCE FOR A SPECIFIC MODISA BAND ;* ;* CALLING SEQUENCE: ;* RES = GET_MODISA_L1B_REFLECTANCE_LINUX(FILENAME) ;* ;* INPUTS: ;* FILENAME - A SCALAR CONTAINING THE FILENAME OF THE PRODUCT FOR REFLECTANCE EXTRACTION ;* ;* KEYWORDS: ;* VERBOSE - PROCESSING STATUS OUTPUTS ;* RES_1KM - INDICATES THAT THE IN_BAND INDEX REFERS TO THE 1KM DATASET ;* RES_500M - INDICATES THAT THE IN_BAND INDEX REFERS TO THE 500M DATASET ;* RES_250M - INDICATES THAT THE IN_BAND INDEX REFERS TO THE 250M DATASET ;* ;* OUTPUTS: ;* TOA_REFL - TOA REFLECTANCE FOR PRODUCT FOLLOWING USE OF SCALING FACTOR ;* ;* COMMON BLOCKS: ;* NONE ;* ;* MODIFICATION HISTORY: ;* M BOUVET - PROTOTYPE DIMITRI VERSION ;* 23 MAR 2011 - C KENT - DIMITRI-2 V1.0 ;* 24 AUG 2011 - C KENT - UPDATED EXCEPTION HANDLING AND OPTIMISED CODE ;* ;* VALIDATION HISTORY: ;* 12 APR 2010 - C KENT - WINDOWS 32-BIT MACHINE IDL 7.1: COMPILATION SUCCESSFUL, ;* RESULTS EQUAL TO MANUAL EXTRACTION OF DATA USING HDF EXPLORER ;* 12 APR 2011 - C KENT - LINUX 64-BIT MACHINE IDL 8.0: COMPILATION SUCCESSFUL, ;* NO APPARENT DIFFERENCES WHEN COMPARED TO WINDOWS MACHINE ;* ;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** FUNCTION GET_MODISA_L1B_REFLECTANCE_LINUX,FILENAME,VERBOSE=VERBOSE,RES_1KM=RES_1KM,RES_500M=RES_500M,RES_250M=RES_250M ;------------------------------------------------ ; CHECK KEYWORDS IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'MODISA L1B REFLECTANCE: STARTING REFLECTANCE RETRIEVAL' TEMP = N_ELEMENTS(RES_1KM)+N_ELEMENTS(RES_500M)+N_ELEMENTS(RES_250M) IF TEMP EQ 0 THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'MODISA L1B REFLECTANCE: NO RESOLUTION SPECIFIED, USING DEFAULT OF 1KM' RES_1KM = [1] ENDIF IF TEMP GT 1 THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'MODISA L1B REFLECTANCE: ERROR, MULTIPLE RESOLUTIONS SELECTED' RETURN,-1 ENDIF ;------------------------------------------------ ; CHECK FILENAME AND IN_BAND ARE NOMINAL IF FILENAME EQ '' THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'MODISA L1B REFLECTANCE: ERROR, INPUT FILENAME INCORRECT' RETURN,-1 ENDIF ;------------------------------------------------ ; START THE SD INTERFACE AND OPEN THE PRODUCT IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'MODISA L1B REFLECTANCE: STARTING IDL HDF SD INTERFACE' MODBAD = 32767 HDF_ID = HDF_SD_START(FILENAME,/READ) IF N_ELEMENTS(RES_1KM) GT 0 THEN SDNAME = 'EV_1KM_RefSB' IF N_ELEMENTS(RES_500M) GT 0 THEN SDNAME = 'EV_500_Aggr1km_RefSB' IF N_ELEMENTS(RES_250M) GT 0 THEN SDNAME = 'EV_250_Aggr1km_RefSB' SDS_NAME = HDF_SD_NAMETOINDEX(HDF_ID,SDNAME) SDS_ID=HDF_SD_SELECT(HDF_ID,SDS_NAME) HDF_SD_GETDATA,SDS_ID,TOA_REFL ATTR_INDX = HDF_SD_ATTRFIND(SDS_ID, 'reflectance_scales') HDF_SD_ATTRINFO, SDS_ID, ATTR_INDX, DATA=TOA_REFL_SLOPES ATTR_INDX = HDF_SD_ATTRFIND(SDS_ID, 'reflectance_offsets') HDF_SD_ATTRINFO, SDS_ID, ATTR_INDX, DATA=TOA_REFL_OFFSET HDF_SD_ENDACCESS, SDS_ID ;----------------------------------------------- ; CLOSE THE PRODUCT AND SD INTERFACE IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'MODISA L1B REFLECTANCE: CLOSING PRODUCT AND RETURNING REFLECTANCE DATA' HDF_SD_END,HDF_ID ;----------------------------------------------- ; CONVERT TO REFLECTANCE TOA_REFL = FLOAT(TEMPORARY(TOA_REFL)) TEMP_DIMS = SIZE(TOA_REFL) FOR I=0,TEMP_DIMS[3]-1 DO BEGIN TEMP = TOA_REFL[*,*,I] VALID = WHERE(TEMP LT MODBAD,COUNT) IF COUNT GT 0 THEN TEMP[VALID] = TOA_REFL_SLOPES[I]*(TEMP[VALID]-TOA_REFL_OFFSET[I]) TOA_REFL[*,*,I] = TEMP ENDFOR ;----------------------------------------------- ; RETURN,L1B_RAD ;NOTE, THIS IS RHO*SZA RETURN,TOA_REFL END
